channel.title: RuneHub 508
channel.description:
Before I get flamed, credits so far:
Me Jamie (ftw) Jagex
Err yeah that's it I guess. I've pretty much been creating my own stuff and not using too many tuts.
So, pics: [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/adkj6r.jpg[/img]
I'm trying to get shopping done atm, so if someone knows how to make shops on summon-pkz 508, then PLEASE pm me. I can do it on other bases, but I'm having problems for this one.. :(
Some of you may remember RuneHub earlier, if you've played on it, you could say it was pretty boring as an ::item server, etc... So I'm basically re-doing it and making it much better. (With an economy)
I'm out, gonna order some cheese pizza sticks :D
